headline: Russian fighter came within 15 feet of U.S. Air Force jet
content: By Barbara Starr and Brad Lendon, CNNUpdated 1336 GMT (2136 HKT) January 30, 2016  (CNN)A Russian fighter jet came within 15 feet of a U.S. Air Force reconnaissance plane over the Black Sea this week in what the Pentagon is calling an "unsafe" incident, U.S. officials say.
